verses.roman:
śraddhā-yukta hañā ihā śune yei jana
acire milaye tāre gopāla-caraṇa

synonyms: śraddhā-yukta—with faith and love; hañā—being; ihā—this narration; śune—hears; yei—which; jana—person; acire—very soon; milaye—gets; tāre—he; gopāla-caraṇa—the lotus feet of Lord Gopāla.
translation: One who hears this narration of Lord Gopāla with faith and love very soon attains the lotus feet of Lord Gopāla.
